text: AP-Pew poll also shows strong double-digit leads in NH and SC; Clinton leading on important issues, most electable Hillary Clinton leads all Democrats in Iowa, according to a new AP-Pew poll showing her leading by 5 points, and an Iowa State poll showing her ahead by 7. In addition, new AP-Pew polls show her leading by 19 in New Hampshire and 14 in South Carolina. The polls also show her ahead on the issues most important to voters, as well as the most electable Democrat: Iowa
title: Press Release - Two New Polls: Hillary Clinton Leads in Iowa by 5-7 Points
